aka: 琼贝尼特悬案：谁杀了选美小皇后
this_title: OverKill: The Unsolved Murder of JonBenet Ramsey
trans_title: 琼贝尼特悬案：谁杀了选美小皇后
introduction: OverKill examines the 1996 murder of JonBenet Ramsey. It looks at evidence gathered over the years by Lawrence Schiller author of the bestseller "Perfect Murder, Perfect Town". It looks at police investigation tapes and sworn depositions offered by many of those involved in the case and tries to piece together what happened.
foreign_title: OverKill: The Unsolved Murder of JonBenet Ramsey
